TextView.android:text: __ABOUT US__ Medlogs brings to you an online platform, which can be accessed for all your health needs. We are trying to make healthcare a hassel-free experience for you.
__Idea__To develop a system that will find the generic substitute with respect to the branded ones. To spread the awareness about the availability of generic medicines.

__WHAT WE OFFER__ It will compare the composition of the medicine, and suggest a similar generic medicine with the same composition which is available at a cheaper rate. It will also display the precautionary statements, price, composition. It will show the nearest generic stored based on your current location.
